strapiPost.title: Pesto Café In Fayetteville Reopens Under New Ownership
strapiPost.content:
After closing in 2022, Fayetteville's iconic Pesto Café has been brought back to life by Chef Lance, and reopened over Memorial Weekend as Pesto's by Lance.

  • Local favorite: Pesto Café originally opened in the late 1990's and became a local staple for Italiain cuisine, serving pasta, pesto, and red sauce in its classic, hole-in-the-wall location adjoined with Chief Motel on College Ave.
  • Meet the chef: For nearly three decades, Chef Lance has honed his culinary skills, holding positions from Sous Chef to Executive Chef and winning several awards. He's excited to revive Pesto Café and share his passion for Classic Italian Cuisine with the vibrant food scene of Fayetteville.

Learn more about Pesto's by Lance HERE.
